metadata.title: CVE-2017-16852 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: shibsp/metadata/DynamicMetadataProvider.cpp in the Dynamic MetadataProviderplugin in Shibboleth Service Provider before 2.6.1 fails to properlyconfigure itself with the MetadataFilter plugins and does not performcritical security checks such as signature verification, enforcement ofvalidity periods, and other checks specific to deployments, aka SSPCPP-763.

criterions.comment: shibboleth-sp2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
